duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, architect, and provide production support for complex SSIS packages.
Build ETL components according to ETL specifications with a focus on performance, dependency, auditing, error handling, and data quality.
Support post-deployment by debugging, fixing, and participating in maintenance of ETL processes.
Ensure data integrity and quality within the Dashboard presentation layer.
Conduct code reviews, troubleshoot code-related issues, and review and provide feedback on user documentation.
Read and understand business requirements, write functional requirements, develop detailed technical designs, and build/unit/system test ETL code.
Work with Onsite/offshore model and experience migrating data from Oracle to SQL Server.
Experience with lift-and-shift SSIS to Azure Data Factory and Agile methodology software development.
